DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy Duloxetine vs. placebo pain determine change Brief Pain Inventory ( BPI ) baseline 8 week treatment
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Double Blind Study Evaluating Duloxetine Outpatients With MDD Pain
DOC.criteria: Major Depressive Disorder accord DSMIV criterion least one previous depressive episode patient 's medical history Painful physical symptom measure Brief Pain InventoryShort Form Any anxiety disorder primary diagnosis within past 6 month ( include panic disorder , OCD , PTSD , generalize anxiety disorder social phobia ) Any diagnosis bipolar disorder , schizophrenia , psychotic disorder
